home.description:
Wall Street methodologies, systematically quantified.
Evidence-based investment decisions, not gut feelings.
home.methodScoringDesc: A+ to F grades based on core financial metrics including profitability, valuation, and growth rates.

home.methodTrackingDesc: Cumulative analysis history by date to track changes over time and inform investment decisions.
home.footer: For informational purposes only, not investment advice

auth.title: Login to Investory
auth.description: Sign in to access real-time quotes and stock analysis features
auth.loginInfo: Only your email address is collected and used solely for authentication

legal.privacyIntro: Investory (the 'Service') values your privacy. This policy explains what information we collect and how we use it.
legal.collectDesc: When you sign in with Google, we collect only:
legal.collectNone: We do not collect your name, profile picture, or any other personal information.
legal.storageDesc: Your email address is not stored on our servers. It is only contained in an encrypted JWT cookie in your browser, which automatically expires after 30 days.
legal.sharingDesc: We do not share your personal information with any third parties.
legal.cookieDesc: The Service uses session cookies for authentication. Cookies are protected with httpOnly, Secure (in HTTPS environments), and SameSite attributes.
legal.rightsDesc: You can log out at any time to end your session, and delete browser cookies to remove all authentication data.
legal.contactDesc: For privacy-related inquiries, please contact the service administrator.
legal.termsIntro: These terms govern your use of Investory (the 'Service'). By using the Service, you agree to these terms.
legal.serviceDesc: Investory is a platform that provides data-driven analysis for US stock investments.
legal.disclaimerDesc: All information provided by the Service (analysis reports, investment scores, technical indicators, etc.) is for informational purposes only and does not constitute investment advice. Investment decisions are entirely your own responsibility.
legal.accountDesc: Some features require Google account sign-in. You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account.
legal.dataDesc: The Service uses external data sources (Alpha Vantage, Finnhub, etc.) and does not guarantee the accuracy or real-time nature of the data. Please verify with official financial data sources before making actual trades.
legal.liabilityDesc: The Service provider shall not be liable for any direct or indirect damages arising from the use of the Service, to the maximum extent permitted by law.
legal.changeDesc: These terms may be changed without prior notice. Updated terms become effective upon posting on the Service.
legal.governingDesc: These terms shall be governed by the laws of the Republic of Korea.
